posts.post_title: FS - T206s Jordan (EPDG), Blackburne (Tolstoi), Magee (Polar Bear) et al
posts.post_content:
First to purchase via PayPal through my website BUY IT NOW button gets the card(s) of their choice.   If you want to use a USPS Money Order, try to reach me through the CONTACT US screen on the site before the card is sold and I'll put it on hold for you.

Click the link to get to the T206 page on my site...

[URL="http://cassidyssportscards.webs.com/t20619091911.htm"][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/CassidysSportscardsBanner.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Latest additions:

Tim Jordan (Portrait) EPDG PSA 2 GOOD                   $59
Lena Blackburne  Tolstoi PSA 4 VG-EX                    $125
Sherry Magee (with Bat)  Polar Bear  SGC 40 VG 3     $99
